content:
# The error indicates that I cannot craft the Stone Furnace because it requires stone, which must be gathered first. 
# This reinforces the need to gather resources before crafting any items.

# Since I have been unable to find any resources so far, I will attempt to gather wood again, as it is a basic resource that can be harvested.

# Step 9: Attempt to find and gather wood once more.
wood_position = nearest(Resource.Wood)  # Searching for wood resource again.
move_to(wood_position)  # Moving to the wood resource patch.
